title: Callous Heir
description: I made the mistake of falling for one of my brother’s friends. As if that wasn’t stupid enough, I then declared my love to him.Yeah, I know. Big mistake. Huge mistake.But here I am with my rejected feelings, and Noah won’t even look at me. Whenever he has to talk to me, his words are blunt. Yet they cut deeper than any knife.What’s a girl to do when the man she loves won’t give her the time of day?Make herself irreplaceable in his life, of course.Noah WestMore handsome than all the rest.I loved him from deep in my bones,But then he found outAnd became all curtAnd trampled my heart in the dirt.
author: Michelle Heard
